amendment.description: Page 130, strike lines 6 through 11 and insert the following: ***.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in the Congressional Record to redistribute affordable housing grants for use in disaster areas that were allotted to Louisiana and Mississippi to include both Alabama and Texas in addition to Louisiana and Mississippi.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Green, Al amendment was withdrawn.
Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. Green, Al.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. Green, Al.
